info.title: Release Candidate Messages
info.description: The specifications of messages which are ready for ICAR approval and release

get.summary: Get available schema/id combinations for locations.
get.description:
# Purpose
Provide a list of available locations.
Should return only those combinations the user currently logged in has access to.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the available locations.

get.summary: Get the data for milking visits
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides data from visits of animals to a milking parlour.
 
This comprises all possible data. Anybody can choose to define API's that return less information in the response.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the milking results for the given location

get.summary: Get the test days
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides data from the test days on a farm that intersects with the given start/end date if provided. Otherwise returns all available entries.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the test days for the given location

get.summary: Get the data for test day results
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides data from the test day for animals on a farm

200.description: Successful. The response contains the test day results for the given location

get.summary: Get the data for lactations
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides data from lactations of animals.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the milking results for the given location

get.summary: Get the list of observed changes to lactation status for animals.
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides a list of events arising from observed changes to lactation status.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the milking results for the given location

get.summary: Get the births for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the born animals on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the births for the given location

get.summary: Get the deaths for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the died animals on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the died animals for the given location

get.summary: Get the arrivals for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the arrived animals on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the arrived animals for the given location

get.summary: Get the departures for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the departed animals from a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the milking results for the given location

get.summary: Get the animals for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the animals on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the animals for the given location

get.summary: Get the animal sets for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the animal sets on a location. If animal-id-scheme and animal-id are provided, the sets containing that animal are returned.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the animal sets for the given location

get.summary: Get the animal set join events for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the animal set join events on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the join animal set events of animals for the given location

get.summary: Get the animal set leave events for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the animal set leave events on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the leave animal set events of animals for the given location

get.summary: Get the pregnancy checks for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the pregnancy checks on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the pregnancy diagnosis for the given location

get.summary: Get the heats for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the Heats on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the heats for the given location

get.summary: Get the inseminations for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose

200.description: Successful. The response contains the inseminations for the given location

get.summary: Get the drying off for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the drying off on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the drying off for the given location

get.summary: Get the abortion events for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the abortion events on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the abortion events for the given location

get.summary: Get the animals that were assigned as do-not-breed for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the not be bred animals on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the not to be bred animals for the given location

get.summary: Get the parturition events for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the Parturition events on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the Parturition events for the given location

get.summary: Get the weight data of animals
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides weight data from animals on a farm.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the weight results for the given location

get.summary: Get the device data for a location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides device data for devices present on a farm.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the device data for the given location

get.summary: Get the breeding values of the animals of a location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides breeding values of the animals present on a farm.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the breeding values of the animals of the given location

get.summary: Get the mating recommendations for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the mating recommendations on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the mating recommendations for the given location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the conformation scores for the given location

get.description:

Provides the animal health diagnoses for a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the diagnoses for the given location.

get.summary: Get the treatments for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the animal health treatments for a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the treatments for the given location.

get.summary: Get the treatment programs for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose

200.description: Successful. The response contains the treatment progams for the given location.

get.summary: Get the gestations for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the gestations for a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the gestations for the given location.

get.summary: Get the list of observed changes to animal reproductive status
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides a collection of events where a change to animal reproductive status has been observed.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the reproductive status change observations for the given location.

location-scheme.name: location-scheme
location-scheme.description: The scheme id for the location identifier.

location-id.name: location-id
location-id.description: The unique identifier for the location.

start-date-time.name: start-date-time
start-date-time.description: The start of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

end-date-time.name: end-date-time
end-date-time.description: The end of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

animal-id-scheme.name: animal-id-scheme
animal-id-scheme.description: The scheme id for the animal identifier.

animal-id.name: animal-id
animal-id.description: The unique identifier for the animal.

default.description: An error has occured while handling the request. Check the content of the message for the error details.

schema.description: A default response containing only a list of errors
